org.grouplens.lenskit.knn.item.model

Class ItemItemBuildContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.knn.item.model.ItemItemBuildContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @DefaultProvider(value=ItemItemBuildContextProvider.class)
@Shareable
public class ItemItemBuildContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    Encapsulation of data needed during an item-item model build. This class provides access to item vectors and the item universe for use in building up the model in the accumulator.

    This is shareable to make it more usable in the evaluator. Typical built models will not include it, and any dependencies on it should be Transient.

    See Also:
    ItemItemModelBuilder, Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ItemItemBuildContext.ItemVecPair
      A pair of item ids and their corresponding item vectors, avoiding (un)boxing the ids.

    • Method Detail

      • getItems

        @Nonnull
public LongSortedSet getItems()

        Get the set of items.

        Returns:
        The set of all items to build a model over.

      • itemVector

        @Nonnull
public SparseVector itemVector(long item)

        Get the rating vector for an item. Rating vectors contain normalized ratings, using the applicable VectorNormalizer on the user rating vectors.

        Parameters:
        item - The item to query.
        Returns:
        The rating vector for item.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if item is not a valid item.

      • getUserItems

        @Nonnull
public LongSortedSet getUserItems(long user)

        Get the items rated by a particular user.

        Parameters:
        user - The user to query for.
        Returns:
        The items rated by user.

      • getItemPairIterator

        @Deprecated
public java.util.Iterator<ItemItemBuildContext.ItemVecPair> getItemPairIterator()
        Deprecated. This will go away in LensKit 3.0.

        Returns an Iterator over all item vector pairs.

        Returns:
        An Iterator over ItemVecPairs, an object offering public access to the item ids and their corresponding vectors.
